name: Warawara Invaders
description:
Warawara Invaders is a 2d casual rolling shooter.Features
  • 30 stages per round.
  • The playing time until the end of 1 round is about 15 to 30 minutes.
  • Mouse & XInput controller are supported. Some shortcut operations are supported with a keyboard.
  • No scrolling. Fixed screen.
  • Although it is Shmup, there is no need to avoid bullets. In any case destroy enemies and enemy bullets!
  • Practice mode (Stage select) is implemented.
  • Because of very low level difficulty, it is best for killing time.
  • It is also recommended for casual gamers & shmup beginners. But it may not be suitable for hardcore gamers.
  • The difficulty level is NORMAL only.
  • Steam Leaderboards, Steam Achievements, and Steam Cloud are supported. When playing in fullscreen, please enable Steam Overlay to enable achievements-popup display.
Warning: Objects on the screen are always rotating, so please be careful about motion sickness. Please refer to the movie about the contents of the game.Game SystemFor explanation of the game system & how to play, refer to the link of "View the manual" in the right list.
